snippet.title: Forgotten Hope 2 - New Bolt-Action Mechanics
snippet.description:
Greetings! 

This is a preview about the new bolt-action rifle bolting mechanics that are coming with the new 2.64 version of Forgotten Hope 2, launching 23rd of January 2024! 

Make sure to check out what else we will be releasing with this update from our website http://forgottenhope.warumdarum.de/ !

Download and play Forgotten Hope 2 for free as a standalone from https://playfh2.net/ !
